text: Bramley is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== The suburb is situated on part of an old Witwatersrand farm called Syferfontein. It was established in 1904 and was named after one of the landowners, Edward Bramley. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Bramley, Gauteng
